verses.name: Daniel 5:4
verses.text: They drank wine, and praised the gods of gold, and of silver, of brass, of iron, of wood, and of stone.

verses.name: Daniel 5:5
verses.text: In the same hour came forth fingers of a man’s hand, and wrote over against the candlestick upon the plaister of the wall of the king’s palace: and the king saw the part of the hand that wrote.

verses.name: Daniel 5:6
verses.text: Then the king’s countenance was changed, and his thoughts troubled him, so that the joints of his loins were loosed, and his knees smote one against another.
